meanings.definition: Add color to (something) by applying a pigment.
meanings.sent1: She was pigmenting the canvas with bright red paint.
meanings.sent2: The artist enjoys pigmenting her artwork with various shades.
meanings.sent3: The toddler thought he was pigmenting the walls with crayons, much to his mother's dismay.
meanings.sent4: The sunset was pigmenting the sky with hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The gardener was carefully pigmenting the flowers to create a vibrant display.

meanings.sent1: Over time, the leaves pigmenting into a beautiful golden hue.
meanings.sent2: The skin starts pigmenting after prolonged exposure to the sun.
meanings.sent3: The chameleon was pigmenting to match the color of the leaf it was sitting on.
meanings.sent4: The cityscape was pigmenting as the lights turned on at dusk.
meanings.sent5: The fabric was slowly pigmenting as the dye set in.
